hotels.title: New York Ultra-Cool Loft-Style Escape in the Heart of Tribeca
hotels.description: The downtown area of Tribeca, stomping ground for effortlessly cool New Yorkers, is yours to experience with a stylish stay at the newly opened, loft-style Smyth Tribeca. This chic hotel opened its doors in 2021 and enjoys a superb location in a quiet residential area, just off the main thoroughfare. You'll be in easy reach of New York City's world-class restaurants, art galleries, designer boutiques, parks and cultural attractions. Unwind in minimalist spaces that offer a tranquil oasis away from the buzz of the city. Spend the time between exploring sweating it out at the shiny state-of-the-art gym, grabbing a bite to eat at the onsite restaurant or ordering a cosmopolitan at the glamorous lobby bar.
